content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Oil extraction setup at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of a pumpjack at position(17.5, 40.5) and a small electric pole at position(19.5, 40.5)

### Boiler setup at position(12.5, 41.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(12.5, 41.0)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable locations
- Ensure the target location is buildable and not occupied by another entity or water before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when using undefined variables
- Make sure to define a variable before using it. Check the scope and initialization of the variable.

### Errors when getting a non-existent entity
- Verify that an entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
